result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Latria G Sheets

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Latria G Sheets in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Latria G Sheets.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for a deferred prosecution agreement hearing. Defense completed a TAD evaluation, but no DPA offer has been provided by the State. Court will put case on trial calendar. Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse. Case adjourned.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Latria G Sheets in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Latria G Sheets.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. Victim DRT appeared in court.
Case in court for Deferred Prosecution Agreement hearing.
Defense counsel requests additional time so defendant can complete a TAD evaluation.
DPA Hearing adjourned to Branch 13.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Latria G Sheets in court with attorney Michael Fuentes for Sam Obscherning.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense request for an adjournment of the DPAH granted.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Latria G Sheets in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Latria G Sheets appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review.  Defense to schedule a TAD evaluation.   DPA Hearing scheduled in Branch 37.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON (5/19/2022). IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with D.R.T.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Latria G Sheets in court.  Claire Louise Starling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Latria G Sheets
Current: 5152 N 70th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53218   (Effective: 05-17-2022)
Prior: 5342 North 27th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/17/2022@2:00pm
